title: Looking for an Experienced Google Media Buyer
job_overview:
We are a dropshipping company with multiple stores across Europe and the US selling fashion items and home decors.

What You’ll Do:

Manage Google Ads campaigns for 20-30 dropshipping stores, primarily in the fashion niche, with an understanding of seasonality trends. Handle multiple SKUs per ad account, ensuring optimized performance across diverse product lines.
Monitor and analyze account performance daily, making data-driven adjustments to maximize ROI.
Collaborate with me to develop creative strategies that align with our brand and goals.

What I’m Looking For:
Proven experience as a Google Media Buyer
Deep expertise in Google Ads, including campaign setup, optimization, and scaling.
A proactive, detail-oriented mindset with a passion for checking and refining campaigns every day.
Comfort working in a fast-paced environment, juggling multiple stores and SKUs with ease.
Knowledge of the fashion industry and its seasonal trends is a big plus!

What I can offer:
Full-time position with flexible hours
A collaborative, supportive environment
The chance to work with a variety of products and campaigns

How to apply: Send us your resume and portfolio, along with your salary expectation per month.
